Question 23 
 
A single-phase, 4 kVA, 200 V/100 V, 50 Hz transformer with laminated CRGO steel core has rated no-
load loss of 450 W. When the high-voltage winding is excited with 160 V, 40 Hz sinusoidal ac supply, 
the no-load losses are found to be 320 W. When the high-voltage winding of the same transformer is 
supplied from a 100 V, 25 Hz sinusoidal ac source, the no-load losses will be __________ W (rounded 
off to 2 decimal places). 
Ans. 
162.5
